caption:
“From dust to devotion.”

Reflection:
From the earth we rise, by grace we live, and to worship we return. Dust becomes sacred when lifted by love.

Commentary:
This reflection celebrates transformation — that even humble beginnings can become holy when the heart turns toward God.
